home.heroDescription: You can find us at many weekly markets in Hamburg. Under Locations you can find all our stalls where you can visit us.
home.aboutText1: We are a Hamburg family business specializing in homemade Mediterranean specialties and vegan delicacies since 1992.
home.aboutText2: In the best North German tradition, we keep our promises. We stand for high-quality products at a fair price.
home.aboutText3: Everything must be right with us: the quality, the service, and human interaction.
home.teamText1: First and foremost, we strive to offer our customers a great shopping experience. We can only achieve this with a well-trained and motivated team.
home.teamText2: That's why we invest in teamwork and a good working environment for our employees.
home.customerReviews: Listen to what our customers had to say
home.testimonial1: The food was great, we had a mixed platter. Definitely recommend - and worth a second visit.
home.testimonial2: Everything is just right here, very delicious food, great atmosphere, excellent value for money and very attentive friendly service
